tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Vandita's got a good hand when it comes to seemingly painful treatments. The fact that she explains the issue and the solution she's going to apply makes the treatment easier for a patient. She's one of those handful doctors who educate and want their patients to know their case firsthand. Not only do I trust her more because of that, but I am also more comfortable with getting my treatment done from her. 

I recently visited her to get my wisdom tooth extracted. At one instance, she told me that it may hurt. Interestingly, I was expecting pain, but the treatment completed and I didn't even realize!

tags: None
review: I have visited Vandita more than once for three troubles I had with my teeth. Truly speaking the thought of visiting a dentist sent fear and shock waves through my mind as I had very bitter experiences in the past. I used to avoid seeing them.. But as per recommendation I visited Dr.Vandita and she was very gentle at checking and telling me about my tooth issues. I got a root canal and a tooth extraction treatment done from her after that. And she has given the best treatment to me. She is surely the best dentist in Bombay. I have developed trust and confidence that Dr.Vandita will give the best treatment. Thank you Dr.Vandita, with you around I am not afraid of getting any teeth treatment done..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had lost hope regarding the state of my oral hygiene but it was Dr.Vandita who infused in me the confidence to smile again. With her sweet smile and ever encouraging talks kept me totally unawares of the extraction part and her subtle way of injecting helped me to keep going to her again and again earlier the thought of going to the dentist would bring goosebumps which she helped me overcome not only this she most connivingly never would devuldge what she was to do next coz it would scare me off but bless this daughter of mine to get a smile on my face again. Love you beta to the core. Bless you abundantly. Forgot to mention her treatment was totally cost effective. Love you beta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr vandita agarwal is a fantastic.Dr.she is so humble and polite.while doing the treatment she is so careful and so soft .Pain does not feel only.and the way she explain feel like wow I came to a good Dr .She will cure me completely. I recommend many of my friends and there experience was same like me.
She is a wonderful Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Vandita is by far one of the amazingly talented dentist in town, she really has a wonderful way of treating her patients with utmost care & good part about her is that she Patiently answers all the queries you have regarding the not so important stuff aswell, highly recommend Dr Vandita, she is super quick and sturdy while performing any procedure! Keep up the good work Doc!

Hope to see you soon

tags: None
review: I have always been scared to go to Dentists, and she has made it so simple for me. She is very professional and polite. Makes her patients very comfortable. She also doesn't prescribe unnecessary tests and medicines. I have recommended her to my friends and family. She is one of the best doctors I have visited.

tags: None
review:
Vandita is a young doctor with an approach of a seasoned veteran. She explains the treatment procedure in detail so as a patient you are very clear how the treatment will proceed. The guidelines which she sets for recovery are very easy to follow and facilitates  your early recovery. 
My self and my wife are very happy to have her as our family dentist . not only that my in laws visited her from outstation for their treatment and were very happy with their treatment .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Having migrated from a Dentist of 20 years to Vandita, she made the transition really easy. Explains the issue properly, available all the time, equipped with the latest technology in dental care etc etc makes her the most "Go To" Dentist. Wish her all the best for the future !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Best part about the whole treatment was how from the start I was told how much time the whole process will take, how much it will cost, every detail. Dr Vandita was very clear and confident from the start about every step, even when it was paining a bit. I am happy and content with the RCT given by her and would recommend her for any dental procedures.

tags: None
review:
Dr Vandita Agrawal is an extremely patient and skilled Dentist.
I was the kind who would do anything to stay away from a dental clinic but Dr Vandita put me at ease and explained to me every procedure before and answered all my queries.
 I would definitely recommend her to my family and friends and anyone who I come across with a toothache!

review: Great treatment for teeth along with detailed discussion regarding the issues and solutions. Great interaction skills as well. 100% satisfied with the visit.

tags: None
review: The clinic was very clean and hygenic and the doctor is very polite and professional. Overall it was a very pleasant experience and i will recommend it to my family and friends.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The experience was good . In these 3 years i myself felt many changes in my teeth as well as my jaw. Though the treatment was little bit painful but now the tooth structure is excellent .

review:
It was closed. Why did u all not check it before booking my appointment. I had to come all the way from royal palms.

The doctor doesn't attend the call and then wen I reached it was shut.
